title: End of The United Kingdom?
itunes:title: End of The United Kingdom?
description:
In this special episode, we look at the future of the United Kingdom.

Miles Briggs, Member of the Scottish Parliament for Lothian, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek a second referendum isn't the answer, despite polls showing increasing support for independence.

Plus, David Edgerton, professor of modern British history at King's College London explains why he doesn't see the U.K. surviving as an entity.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
